name: Sunset Turtle Spotting Cruise
description: Experience a breathtaking 1-hour cruise along the stunning Whitsunday coastline while searching for turtles and enjoying sensational sunset displays. Departing from Coral Sea Marina, this private charter offers complimentary glasses of bubbles as you take in the picturesque scenery from Pigeon Island to Mandalay.
highlights: Sunset views | Turtle spotting | Private charter
important_info: BYO drinks allowed | Full shade and all-round clear screens for weather protection
tags: sunset cruise, turtle spotting, private charter, Whitsundays

name: One Hour Turtle Spotting Cruises
description: Step aboard the quietest boat in the Whitsundays and join us as we stealthily stalk our local turtles. With Tallulah’s whisper quiet electric motor, it’s easy to get up close to these amazing creatures while enjoying the fresh air and calm waters.
highlights: Turtle spotting | Wildlife sightings | Scenic views
important_info: Relax in full shade and weatherproof comfort. No smelly fumes from the boat.
tags: turtle spotting, wildlife, Whitsundays, boat tour
